p: The LD 50 of 1.56 mg/mL was higher than the effective concentrations reported by us against H. pylori (8–64 μg/mL) and cell lines (22.3–250 μg/mL), but in the same range as those found active against S. aureus strains (8–24 mg/mL). In this case, the putative topical administration of the hemp EO to combat S. aureus wound infections guarantees a discrete safety index with respect to the parental administration in G. mellonella larvae.
